::Firaxis::
       He nods and walks onto the ship.  "Come here Horn."  The dog comes 
running onto the ship.  "Good boy, now sit.  Stay.  Good sit stay."  He pats 
him on the head and takes the controls.  They lift off and head for the polar 
region.

--part1_12a.13af8ad5.2a58b5ce_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
